hanzi-su-wiki:
携

Значения

Держать, иметь при себе; иметь отношение; сотрудничать, делать сообща

Мнемоника

Действовать 扌 сообща, как ласточки 隹, строящие гнездо или кормящие 乃 птенцов.

Варианты

攜
purpleculture_pinyin:
xié
to carry; to take along; to bring along; to hold (hands); also pr. [xi1]
нести; взять с собой; взять с собой; держать (руками); также пр. [xi1]
rtega_mnemonic:
攜攜RS
携携		㩗㩦擕lead by hand, take with, carry
  • hand 扌 making someone revolve 雟: lead
  • ⓢ hand 扌 leading pregnant bird 隽
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 攜)
Pictophonetic: 隽 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
携带 [ xié dài ]: to carry (on one's person); to support (old); Taiwan pr. [xi1 dai4]
携手 [ xié shǒu ]: hand in hand; to join hands; to collaborate
便携式 [ biàn xié shì ]: portable
提携 [ tí xié ]: to lead by the hand; to guide; to support
扶老携幼 [ fú lǎo xié yòu ]: taking everyone along, young and old; to look after the elderly and the young
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 隽 [ juàn ] superior, outstanding, talented
heisig_chinese_memo: Imagine you've just arrived in China, but don't have a cell phone yet, so instead you take along a portable turkey you can hold in your fist. To dial a number, just poke it with your fingers.
heisig_constituent: portable, finger, fingers, turkey, fist, from
Keyword_KKLC_ru: носить в руке, взяться за руки
Keyword_KANJIDIC: portable, carry (in hand), armed with, bring along
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: портативный, ручной (в руке), вооружившись, взять с собой
koohiiStory1: This character is the "kei" in "keitai" (cell phone), a word you will no doubt hear often in Japan, since everyone has one. Imagine you´ve just arrived in Japan, but don´t have a cell phone yet, so instead you´re carrying around a portable turkey you can hold in your fist. To dial a number, just poke it with your fingers.
koohiiStory2: Because they have no fingers, turkeys must use their fists when dialing on a portable phone.
kunYomi: たずさ.える、たずさ.わる
jp_example_words:
携帯(けいたい): carrying something
携わる(たずさわる): to participate, to take part
提携(ていけい): cooperation, tie-up, joint business, link-up
jp_readingExamples: 携える (たずさ.える), 携わる (たずさ.わる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Use your fingers to shoo a turkey down the stairs and into a portable carrier. You've been trying to get this turkey into the carrier so you can transport it for like, the past hour. You finally got it done with the help of gravity. And, you know, smacking it a bit in the butt with your fingers.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Turkeys aren't portable on their own. I mean you could pick one up I guess, but it will bite and poop on you. So get it in a portable carrier first.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You needed the turkey to be more portable because you're going to be bringing it to a cake (けい) shop to turn it into a cake. You aren't cooking it! Geez, what's wrong with you? No, you're making a cake OF it, for its birthday. The baker needs to see it for reference.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine getting a portable turkey cake made of your pet turkey. It's made of turkey friendly cake mix.
Ru_Meaning: portable, carry (in hand), armed with, bring along
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 乃 (родительный падеж), 扎, 隹 (старая птица)
Ru_trainchinese: xié: (графема) нести, брать с собой; держать за руку
Kanshudo_mnemonic: whereupon (乃) you put the little bird (隹) in your hand (扌) and carry it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Little red riding hood decides to take along lunch for her grandmother in a car this time but wrecks the car.

English Definition: to carry; to take along; to bring along; to hold (hands); also pr. [xi1]

携字的基本解释

携
xié
带：携手。携带。扶老携幼。
离，叛离：携离。携贰。
carrytake alongtake sb. by hand

携字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》户圭切，平齊，匣。］
亦作“擕1”。亦作“携1”。
(1)提起，提着。
(2)持，拿着。
(3)携带。
(4)牵挽；搀扶。
(5)连接。
(6)离心；离散；离间。
(7)谓远离尘世。

携字的英文翻译

◎ 携
carry, take along, take sb. by hand

携字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　携； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页448第26
俗攜字。

（攜）【唐韻】戸圭切【集韻】懸圭切，?音畦。【說文】提也。【六書故】縣持也。【書·立政】左右攜僕。【註】攜持僕御之人。【詩·大雅】如取如攜。【疏】物在地上，手舉攜之。【禮·曲禮】長者與之提攜，則兩手奉長者之手。【註】提攜，謂牽將行。　又離也。【左傳·僖七年】招攜以禮。【周語】節度不攜。　又連也。【前漢·天文志】杓攜龍角。【註】杓，斗柄也。　又姓。見【姓苑】。或省作㩦。俗作携㩗擕，非。
携字的源字形

携字的起名意思

提，拿，带；拉，牵引。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xié］
["Guangyun" Hu Guiqie, flat, box. ]
Also known as "carry 1". Also known as "carry 1".
(1) Lift and carry.
(2) Hold, hold.
(3) Carry.
(4) To pull; to support.
(5) Connection.
(6) Centrifugation; separation; separation.
(7) Said to be far away from the world.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　 Carry; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 448 26
Common word. (Bringing) 【Tang Yun】戸 Kei cut [Ji Yun] Xuan Kei cut,? Yin Qi. [Said the text] mention also. [Six Books and Gu] The county holds. 【Book·Lizheng】Left and right hand servants. [Note] Those who carry a servant. 【Poetry·Daya】As if taking, like carrying. 【Sparse】The object is on the ground, holding it with your hands. 【Rite·Chu Li】The elders will support them with both hands and serve the elders. [Note] To support, that is to lead the way.　Leave again. [Zuo Zhuan·Seven Years of Xi] Recruit and bring gifts. [Zhou Yu] Jiedu does not carry.　It's even again. [Former Han·Astronomy] The dipper carries the dragon's horn. [Note] Dipper, bucket handle also.　Another last name. See [surname court]. Or province for 㩦. Popular work to carry 㩗 to carry, not.
carry

carry
Name meaning
Lift, take, bring; pull, pull.
携
会意字。从于(手),其古文字形体像手,表示手提;从潮( xie),褐是鸟名,即杜鹃鸟,以鸟会飞表示向上。简体字从#
(手)、从隽,隽本指以弓射肥鸟,也有向上意。本义是提。引申
指携带。
拉;带:一杖「~家带口」~手并肩。
~带 ~眷 ~手 提~ 扶老~幼 ~貳
xié
攜
携
「隶
нести
Зная слово.
Congyu (рука), его древние иероглифы напоминают руку, что означает «несущая рука»; Congchao (xie), коричневый - это название птицы, то есть кукушка, что означает, что птица может летать вверх.
Упрощенные символы Конг (手) и Конг Джун, Джун относятся к стрельбе по толстым птицам из лука, что также означает «вверх».
Первоначальное значение - упоминать.
В более широком смысле это означает нести.
Потяните; пояс: палка «~ цзя ремень рот» ~ руки бок о бок.
~ Принесите ~ Семья ~ Портативный ~ Поддержка старых ~ Молодых ~ II
нести
нести
"писец
xié
I гл.
1) держать на весу, носить, иметь при себе
携枪 с оружием в руках, при оружии
携款赴津 с деньгами отправиться в Тяньцзинь
2) держать за руку, вести
扶老携幼 поддерживать престарелых и вести за руку малолетних
3) * отстоять; отходить (от), отдаляться
招携以礼 обращаться к отходящим (т. е. к изменяющим) согласно этикету
不如私许复曹卫以携之 лучше мы пообещаем вернуть престол князьям Цао и Вэй, чтобы заставить их отойти от Чу
4) * соединяться
杓携龙角 Ковш (т. е. Большая Медведица) соединяется с созвездием Рог Дракона
II собств.
Се (фамилия)
Radicals: 扌, 隹, 乃  (fingers, turkey, stairs)
Meaning Mnemonic
Use your fingers to shoo a turkey down the stairs and into a portable carrier. You've been trying to get this turkey into the carrier so you can transport it for like, the past hour. You finally got it done with the help of gravity. And, you know, smacking it a bit in the butt with your fingers.
Turkeys aren't portable on their own. I mean you could pick one up I guess, but it will bite and poop on you. So get it in a portable carrier first.
Reading Mnemonic
You needed the turkey to be more portable because you're going to be bringing it to a cake (けい) shop to turn it into a cake. You aren't cooking it! Geez, what's wrong with you? No, you're making a cake OF it, for its birthday. The baker needs to see it for reference.
Imagine getting a portable turkey cake made of your pet turkey. It's made of turkey friendly cake mix.
